name: Picopicotron
description:
Picopicotron

Picopicotron is a toy desktop environment built with PICO-8. Use the mouse to control it like a standard computer from the nineties.

  • Play tiny games!
  • Live coding with a very limited version of LUA and pico8 commands!
  • Change the graphics of most things in real time!
  • Take notes and have eyes follow your cursor!
  • Mouse required!

It is a silly project so just have fun!

Live coding!Mine sweeping!Card playing!
